warning_context:
const char *
flags2str(int flagval)
{
	static const struct flagtab values[] = {
		{ MALLOC, "MALLOC" },
		{ STRING, "STRING" },
		{ STRCUR, "STRCUR" },
		{ NUMCUR, "NUMCUR" },
		{ NUMBER, "NUMBER" },
		{ MAYBE_NUM, "MAYBE_NUM" },
		{ FIELD, "FIELD" },
		{ INTLSTR, "INTLSTR" },
		{ NUMINT, "NUMINT" },
		{ INTIND, "INTIND" },
		{ WSTRCUR, "WSTRCUR" },
		{ MPFN,	"MPFN" },
		{ MPZN,	"MPZN" },
		{ NULL_FIELD, "NULL_FIELD" },
		{ ARRAYMAXED, "ARRAYMAXED" },
		{ HALFHAT, "HALFHAT" },
		{ XARRAY, "XARRAY" },
		{ 0,	NULL },
	};

	return genflags2str(flagval, values);
}
